column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I can see why this place is so good and popular! Think of this place as a really amazing La Madeline. Like a million times better. Went here with some friends the other night and had a croissant that had butter and honey? on top. My friend recommended we try it with coffee the next morning and it was so good. Sweet
column3: buttery...all the feels for this place! I'll be back to try their savory items which also looks delish. ;)
